Package com.github.ds67.jminicache.plugin

Interface Plugin<Key,​Value>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsynchronousSubscriberPlugin, PluginManager, StatisticsPlugin, TimingPlugin
    public interface Plugin<Key,​Value>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onAfterGet​(Key key, Value value)
      Called after a key / value pair was retrieved from the cache but before the value is returned to the caller The cache is still locked when calling this method to keep key and value consistent
      void onAfterRemove​(Key key, Value value)
      Called after a key was removed from the cache The cache is still locked when calling this method to keep key and value consistent
      void onAfterSet​(Key key, Value oldValue, Value newValue)
      Called after a new value was inserted in the cache.
      void onBeforeGet​(Key k)  
      void onBeforeRemove​(Key key)  
      void onBeforeSet​(Key k, Value value)  
      void onClear()  
      void onMiss​(Key key)
      Called whenever a key was not found in the cache
      void onRefresh​(Key key)  
      void onShrink​(Key key)  
      void onValueCreateCollision​(Key k)
      Called whenever the cache blocks a thread because a value fetching for the same key takes place in another thread

      • onAfterGet

        void onAfterGet​(Key key,
                Value value)
        Called after a key / value pair was retrieved from the cache but before the value is returned to the caller The cache is still locked when calling this method to keep key and value consistent

        value -

      • onBeforeSet

        void onBeforeSet​(Key k,
                 Value value)

      • onAfterSet

        void onAfterSet​(Key key,
                Value oldValue,
                Value newValue)
        Called after a new value was inserted in the cache. The cache is still locked when calling this method to keep key and value consistent
        Parameters:
        key -
        oldValue - previously stored value for this key or null when key was not contained in the cache
        newValue -

      • onBeforeRemove

        void onBeforeRemove​(Key key)

                   Value value)
        Called after a key was removed from the cache The cache is still locked when calling this method to keep key and value consistent
        Parameters:

        value -
